SELECT sns_board_no.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SNS_BOARD (SNS_BOARD_NO, SNS_BOARD_CONTENT, SNS_BOARD_DATE, SNS_NICKNAME, SNS_ACCOUNT_NO) VALUES ( 'SBN_'||#{snsBoardNo}, #{snsBoardContent}, sysdate, (SELECT SNS_NICKNAME FROM SNS_ACCOUNT S, OWN_USERS O WHERE S.SNS_ACCOUNT_NO = O.SNS_ACCOUNT_NO AND O.USER_ID = 'kjk'), #{snsAccountNo})
